name: Forge
description: The Forge is the Tier 3 variant of the Anvil Bench that will allow the Prospector to craft higher quality tools such as the Platinum Pickaxe , Cold Steel Knife , etc and items crafted at the Anvil Bench ( Iron Axe , Copper Nails , etc). It is also where these tools can be repaired. Unlike other benches, the Forge can be deployed and used outdoors as it does not require shelter. Can be used indoors or outdoors.
